settings.title: NetBird Settings
settings.description: Configure NetBird VPN status display and behavior
settings.refresh-interval-desc: How often to check NetBird status
settings.compact-mode-desc: Show only icon in the bar
settings.show-ip-desc: Display NetBird IP in the bar widget
settings.hide-disconnected-desc: Only show online peers in the panel
settings.show-ping-desc: Ping all connected peers and display latency (ms). Refreshes at the same interval as status.
settings.show-ping-warning: This feature sends ICMP packets to each connected peer at every refresh interval. It may increase network usage and CPU load.
settings.ping-count-desc: Number of ping packets to send when testing connectivity
settings.default-peer-action-desc: Action when clicking on a peer in the panel

terminal-not-configured.title: Terminal Not Configured
terminal-not-configured.message: Please set a terminal command in plugin settings
